statements: UPDATE audit_trails SET transaction_type = 'Payment' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE audit_trails SET transaction_data = '{ "amount": 250.00 }', timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'

UPDATE audit_trail SET log_message = 'Transaction completed successfully', log_timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE transaction_id = 1234;
UPDATE quantum_transactions SET transaction_type='Refund', transaction_amount=1500.00, transaction_date='2022-09-15' WHERE transaction_id=101;
UPDATE user_logs SET action_type='Login', action_description='User logged in successfully', action_date=now() WHERE log_id=201;

UPDATE users SET role = 'admin' WHERE user_id = 98765;
